_comment: This is a template workflow for Qwen Image Edit (img2img/inpaint).
_instructions: Export your ComfyUI workflow in API format and replace this file. Update NODE_MAPPINGS in server.py to match your actual node IDs.

_node_mapping.checkpoint_loader: Node ID that loads the Qwen model checkpoint
_node_mapping.load_image: Node ID that loads the init image
_node_mapping.load_mask: Node ID that loads the mask (optional, for inpainting)
_node_mapping.positive_prompt: Node ID for the positive/main prompt (CLIPTextEncode)
_node_mapping.negative_prompt: Node ID for the negative prompt (CLIPTextEncode)
_node_mapping.vae_encode: Node ID that encodes image to latent
_node_mapping.sampler: Node ID for KSampler (seed, steps, cfg, denoise/strength)
_node_mapping.vae_decode: Node ID that decodes latent to image
_node_mapping.save_image: Node ID that saves/outputs the final image
